title: **3 and Out Weekend Draft Special** --  Middlekauff's Value Philosophy by Position, Player, Round
itunes:title: **3 and Out Weekend Draft Special** --  Middlekauff's Value Philosophy by Position, Player, Round
description:
In this episode, John is coming in hot on a Saturday talking NFL Draft. He explains his scouting philosophy when it comes to defining value, the positions where he sees the most first round value, the positions where it pays to wait, why the 2nd and 3rd rounds are where to find max value, and why future picks aren't equal to current ones. Follow John on Twitter and SUBSCRIBE now to get all the latest content!!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
